description.value:
This tarnished necklace can be attuned only by someone who is holy or unholy. When you attune it, it transforms into your deity's religious symbol or a personal symbol if you don't have a deity. You receive a +3 item bonus to Religion and a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against holy and unholy effects.

Activateâ€”Presence 2 (concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The symbol casts 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bane], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bless], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Divine Wrath], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cleanse Affliction]. Add 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Celestial] to this list if you are holy and 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Fiend] if you are unholy.

The counteract DC of these effects is 38, and the counteract modifier is +28.

Craft Requirements You must be holy or unholy.
